text: O vy, kotoryye uverovali! Ne vodite tesnoy druzhby s lyud'mi ne iz vashey sredy. Oni ne preminut vredit' vam i radovat'sya vashim neudacham. Ikh nenavist' - u nikh na ustakh, a [nenavist'], zatayennaya v serdtsakh u nikh, - yeshche sil'neye. My raz"yasnili vam ayaty, - yesli by vy tol'ko urazumeli [ikh]
